## Participant.totalDamage property

An overview of the damage dealt/taken/shielded by the participant.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly totalDamage: {
        dealt: number;
        taken: number;
        shielded: number;
        toBuildings: number;
        toChampions: number;
        toTurrets: number;
        toObjectives: number;
        mitigated: number;
    };
```
